# types.ContentToolResult { #chatlas.types.ContentToolResult }

```python
types.ContentToolResult(self, id, value=None, name=None, error=None)
```

The result of calling a tool/function

This content type isn't meant to be used directly. Instead, it's
automatically generated by [](`~chatlas.Chat`) when a tool/function is
called (in response to a [](`~chatlas.ContentToolRequest`)).

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name   | Type                                          | Description                                        | Default    |
|--------|-----------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------|------------|
| id     | [str](`str`)                                  | The unique identifier of the tool request.         | _required_ |
| value  | [Any](`typing.Any`)                           | The value returned by the tool/function.           | `None`     |
| name   | [Optional](`typing.Optional`)\[[str](`str`)\] | The name of the tool/function that was called.     | `None`     |
| error  | [Optional](`typing.Optional`)\[[str](`str`)\] | An error message if the tool/function call failed. | `None`     |
